Furniture

Brandner Designâ€™s artistic approach to furniture blends timeless industrial style with contemporary elegance. Primarily using reclaimed, recycled and sustainable materials, a Brandner piece is functional but adds distinction to any space like only fine art can. Every Brandner piece is hand-built in our studio by skilled artists and craftsmen.

View Our Furniture

Who We Are

Jeff Brandner fuses fine art and landscape design to bring a unique aesthetic to every piece he creates. With a commitment to quality and a passion for craftsmanship, his projects are always remarkably unconventional, paying tribute to the classics but with a modern sensibility. He treats every new project as a blank canvas to make a truly distinctive functional and artistic contribution to the world.
